hero.subtitle: Turn your event into an unforgettable experience with the most advanced tools for planning and managing events

eventTypes.title: Your event, your way
eventTypes.description: Whether you're planning a grand wedding, a business event, or an intimate birthday party, our platform is tailored to all types of events and budgets.

wedding.title: Weddings
wedding.description: Perfect planning for your special day

business.title: Business Events
business.description: Conferences, corporate events and product launches

features.title: Advanced Event Planning Tools
features.description: Our platform offers a variety of smart tools to assist you in every step of planning and managing your event.

venue.title: Perfect Venue Selection
venue.description: Find the ideal venue for your event with search options from the central database. Explore halls, gardens, and unique locations, view detailed information, and save your choice as part of your event management.

vendors.title: Smart Vendor Management
vendors.description: Manage all your vendors in one place â€“ music, catering, photography, decoration, and more. The system allows you to search vendors, view their details, save them to your event, and manage all vendors in a structured and organized way.

guests.title: Guest List Management
guests.description: Easily create and manage your guest lists, and track RSVPs. The system allows adding and importing guests in multiple convenient ways, keeping all data organized and synchronized.

seating.title: User-Friendly Seating Arrangements
seating.description: The system allows you to arrange guests at tables manually or automatically, based on guest data. You can view seating arrangements graphically or in a table format and export them for external use.

timeline.title: Schedule and Task Management
timeline.description: Plan your event with a smart schedule for every stage. Receive reminders for important tasks and track progress throughout the planning process. You can also sync tasks with your personal Google Calendar.

budget.title: Smart Budget Management
budget.description: Track your event budget and expenses clearly and efficiently. The system allows managing income and expenses, monitoring the budget, and viewing visual summaries with graphs to maintain control throughout the planning process.

process.title: Simple and Organized Planning Process
process.description: From the initial idea to the day of the event, PlanIt guides you through every step.

step1.title: Event Setup
step1.description: Create an account in PlanIt and set the event type and date. There is also an option for separate seating arrangements if needed.

step2.title: Venue and Vendors
step2.description: The system allows you to search and view details of venues and vendors from the central database. You can save your selections as part of your event and access all relevant information in one organized place.

step3.title: Guest Management
step3.description: The system allows you to create and manage your guest list and track RSVPs. All information is stored and synchronized with other event components.

step4.title: Final Planning and Logistics
step4.description: Arrange seating, set up the budget, and create a structured task list. The system ensures all details are covered and everything is ready for the big day.

step5.title: Event Sharing
step5.description: The system allows you to invite additional users to view or edit the event details.

testimonial1.quote: PlanIt completely changed our wedding planning experience. Instead of stress and worries, we could truly enjoy the process. The budget management and guest list tools saved us so much time and money, and on the event day everything went perfectly!
testimonial1.author: Ronit and Dan
testimonial1.event: Wedding at an Event Garden, June 2024

testimonial2.quote: Seating arrangements used to be my biggest headache. The system solved it within minutes â€“ I just dragged people between tables, and everything was clear and organized. The guests even received a clear map showing where to sit.
testimonial2.author: Michal Cohen

testimonial3.quote: I planned a business event for 200 people. The task list helped me make sure I didnâ€™t miss anything. Everything was written down with dates, and I could easily see what was left to do. Without it, I would have lost my mind.
testimonial3.author: Lior Shmueli

testimonial4.quote: Finding vendors used to be exhausting until I discovered PlanIt. All the vendors in one place with real reviews. I saved several options, compared prices, and chose the best ones for me. It saved me weeks of work.
testimonial4.author: Ori and Shira Levi
